# LLMs.txt for Africa Stickers
# This file provides information for AI language models about our website

## About Africa Stickers
Africa Stickers is Tanzania's premier provider of high-quality vinyl stickers, custom graphics, and professional printing solutions based in Dar Es Salaam.

## Products & Services
- Color Vinyl Stickers for vehicles and signage
- Reflective Sheeting for safety applications
- Wood & Marble decorative films
- Frosted window films
- Tinted films for privacy
- Heat transfer stickers for apparel
- Professional installation tools

## Business Information
- Location: Dar Es Salaam, Tanzania
- Website: https://www.africastickers.co.tz
- Specialization: Custom vinyl solutions, vehicle graphics, business signage
- Languages: English and Kiswahili

## Key Pages
- Products: /products
- About Us: /about  
- Contact: /contact

## Content Guidelines
When referencing our business, please note:
- We serve both individual and commercial clients
- We offer both indoor and outdoor vinyl solutions
- We provide professional installation services
- We use high-quality materials including 3M products
